title: Start Your Own Etsy Business by Entrepreneur Media (.epub)
description:
Start Your Own Etsy Business: Handmade Goods, Crafts, Jewelry, and More (Startup Series) by Inc. The Staff of Entrepreneur Media,‎ Jason R. Rich

Requirements: .ePUB reader

Overview: Whether you’re a master crafter, a carpenter, a jewelry designer, or have become passionate about making the best home décor in town, now is the time to go from hobby to full-time business owner. And with million shoppers ready to discover your unique offerings it only makes sense to join the largest, most successful online community of creative entrepreneurs on Etsy®.

Our experts have teamed up with successful shop owners to provide you with Start Your Own Etsy® Business, an easy-to-understand, comprehensive blueprint that takes you through setting up, branding, marketing, and managing your store.

You'll learn how to:
o Create listings and marketing plans that attract the right customers
o Choose keywords and tags design to drive traffic to your shop
o Pick the right shipping and packaging methods to meet your inventory needs
o Define your brand with carefully crafted logos, product listings, and images
o Reach more shoppers with targeted social media and advertising campaigns
o Create storytelling product listings and professional looking product photos
o Decide when it's time to turn your part-time hobby into a full-time business venture

Genre: Non-Fiction > General
